verbs.description: alabama cb diggs out indefinitely with broken foot alabama [ARG0: coach nick saban] [V: says] [ARG1: cornerback trevon diggs is out indefinitely with a broken foot saban said monday that diggs was injured saturday during the game against arkansas the coach says he did n't know about the injury until after an mri on sunday saban did n't say who will replace diggs in the starting lineup saturday night against missouri saivion smith and freshman patrick surtain jr have both started games at the opposite cornerback spot trevon diggs arkansas saban alabama nick saban]

alabama cb diggs out indefinitely with broken foot alabama coach nick saban says [ARG1: cornerback trevon diggs] [V: is] [ARG2: out] [ARGM-TMP: indefinitely] [ARGM-ADV: with a broken foot] saban said monday that diggs was injured saturday during the game against arkansas the coach says he did n't know about the injury until after an mri on sunday saban did n't say who will replace diggs in the starting lineup saturday night against missouri saivion smith and freshman patrick surtain jr have both started games at the opposite cornerback spot trevon diggs arkansas saban alabama nick saban
